metadata.title: LLMFeed Manifesto
metadata.description: Declaration of intent and ethical foundation for MCP and LLMFeed

intentions.value: We aim to empower any site, not just platforms, to speak to agents.
We believe trust must be visible, verifiable, and revocable.
We encourage public participation and nonprofit certification.

ethics.statement: Users must be able to understand and control what agents can do.
No central registry is required to publish a LLMFeed.
